Olatokunbo Oduyinka Olopade, CON bụ onye ọka iwu Naịjirịa, onye a họpụtara ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka ikpe nke Ogun Steeti
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na-ekpe ikpe enweghị nrụrụ aka kemgbe e guzobere steeti ahụ.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Queens School, Ede na Adeola Odutola College, Ijebu-Ode n'otu n'otu
O nwetara akara ugo mmụta iwu ya na Mahadum nke Ife, a kpọkwara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye ọka iwu n'afọ 1976
Ọ rụburu ọrụ na ngalaba ikpe ziri ezi nke Edo na Lagos steeti

Tupu a họpụta ya dịka onye ọka ikpe ukwu, ọ bụ onye ndụmọdụ steeti (1978), onye nduzi nke ikpe ọha na eze (1993), mgbe ahụ onye ọka ikpe (2011). N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2018, ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa ya ma onye nnọchi anya Honourable Justice Mosunmola Dipeolu na-eme ihe nkiri.
Ọ bụ onye natara nsọpụrụ mba, Commander of the Order of the Niger
